admin.description: admin is the account address of the group admin.

groupId.description: group_id is the unique ID of the group.

memberUpdates.description: member_updates is the list of members to update, set weight to 0 to remove a member.

MsgUpdateGroupMembers.title: Msg Update Group Members
MsgUpdateGroupMembers.description: MsgUpdateGroupMembers is the Msg/UpdateGroupMembers request type.

address.description: address is the member's account address.

weight.description: weight is the member's voting weight that should be greater than 0.

metadata.description: metadata is any arbitrary metadata attached to the member.

cosmos.group.v1.MemberRequest.title: Member Request
cosmos.group.v1.MemberRequest.description: MemberRequest represents a group member to be used in Msg server requests. Contrary to `Member`, it doesn't have any `added_at` field since this field cannot be set as part of requests.
